fulltext:
Lâm Chính Hoài Nam
Front-end Developer
Date of birth:
 Nov 01, 1989
Gender:  Male
Phone:  0902702322
Email:  knight1188@gmail.com
Address:
 43/1C, Thành Thái, P.14, Q.10, Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam
EDUCATION
Oct 2009 - 2012
Aptech University
Major: Information Technology
Main: Software Development
SUMMARY
⦁ A technical architecture (TA) with 2-year experiences at designing and implementing effective technical
business solutions.
⦁ Responsible for handling complex design matters and helping development teams choose tools, platforms,
and coding standards.  
⦁ Solving technical problems, collaborating with the management, selecting the right development
environment, interacting with stakeholders, and making sure projects are completed in time 
⦁ Translate the requirements created by functional analysts and design it exactly 
⦁ Propose Finance Solution: E-commerce.  
⦁ Core Responsibilities:    
⦁ Translate of requirements into a solution vision 
⦁ Combine guidance from different enterprise architecture viewpoints 
⦁ Team size: 20 members
TECHNICAL SKILLS
⦁ Programming Languages: PHP, NodeJs
⦁ Scripting Languages: HTML, JavaScript, CSS, XML, and JSON.
⦁ Database Management Systems: MySQL, MongoDB
⦁ Cloud: Amazon AWS, Azure
⦁ IDEs: Visual Studio Code
⦁ Operating Systems: Windows, Linux
⦁ Others: Open source, GIT
⦁ Soft Skills: teamwork & self-training skills, public speaking.
WORK EXPERIENCE
2017 - 2019
Present : DFO GLOBAL
FRONT-END DEVELOPER
⦁
⦁ Project Description
CTRWOW offers a full suite of proven and tested landing pages and
sales funnels, highly optimized to deliver the most conversions for your
business.
- CTRWow is always free for clients of eManage CRM. Save money on
expensive developers and build powerful and beautiful websites.
- Why start from scratch when you can leverage proven, tested, and
highly optimized elements and templates that are already driving
millions on profit.
- Every extra second of load time can cost 5-10% off your conversion
rate. Our funnels are insanely fast, visually stunning, and high-
performing across devices.
- With CTRWOW’s incredible drag-and-drop page builder, you are
automatically equipped with an arsenal of highly optimized, top-
converting pages and assets that give you an instant leg-up on the
competition
⦁ Team size: 10
⦁ ⦁  Responsibilities:  
⦁ Support Sales Funnel Flow 
⦁ Create Framework and organize code
⦁ Reporting, Coding.
⦁ Database: MongoDB
⦁ Cloud: AWS, Azure
⦁ Language: NodeJS, ReactJs
⦁ Source management: GIT, SVN
⦁ OS: Windows 7, Linux
https://www.ctrwow.com
2014 - 2017
CinQSmile
FRONT-END DEVELOPER

It is a unique function of RECOG that you can feel free to convey your
feelings of praise to your friends. 
The "letter" that was awarded will also be shared by other members, so
that everyone will be paying attention to the activities and contributions
that have not been seen until now.
